name: Updated SCP Wiki Night Mode (READ THE DESCRIPTION)
description: An updated modification of SCP Wiki Night Mode to add additional edits to pages that like to mess with the format. NOTE: Unfortunately there is an error with stylish that causes the regexp to be cut off in code 2 due to how lengthy it is, the only method I know of how to fix it is below. 1. Select the edit button above (assuming you installed it). 2. Scroll down to code 2 in the new window. 3. There should be an "applies to" section under the code, replace it with the notes from the latest update below: 4. Press save. If you did everything correctly it should be functioning.
